attributes.action: To raise the issue of food aid in Zimbabwe at UN Security Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Zimbabwe Government has acted to prevent the distribution of aid to the people of Zimbabwe who are in need of food, water and assistance.  Many of these people are suffering as a result.  The resumption of aid distribution needs to happen as soon as possible.  The United Nations should act now to save lives.
